title: List of all Android map  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android map  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-maps-utils
repoList.description: Maps SDK for Android Utility Library

repoList.name: GoogleDirectionLibrary
repoList.description: [Android] Library for Google Direction API for Google Maps Android API v2

repoList.name: mapsforge
repoList.description: Vector map library and writer - running on Android and Desktop.
repoList.license: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0

repoList.name: AndroidSlidingUpPanel
repoList.description: This library provides a simple way to add a draggable sliding up panel (popularized by Google Music and Google Maps) to your Android application. Brought to you by Umano.

repoList.name: DrawRouteMaps
repoList.description: Library for draw route maps between two point LatLng

repoList.name: android-maps-extensions
repoList.description: Android Maps Extensions is a library extending capabilities of Google Maps Android API v2.

repoList.name: MapViewPager
repoList.description: Android library that connects ViewPager fragments with Google Maps markers.

repoList.name: MapNavigator
repoList.description: Easy to use library to get and display driving directions on Google Maps v2 in Android

repoList.name: OpenWeatherMap-Android-Library
repoList.description: A wrapper for the openweathermap  REST API

repoList.name: GoogleDirectionAndPlaceLibrary
repoList.description: [Android] Library for Google Direction API and Google Place API for Google Maps Android API v2
